body: @tsuntsundere @jazzboy That's because non-vanilla is the new norm. Non-Japanese may be just getting into the whole anime and hentai culture recently, but Japanese has been at it for YEARS. It's synonymous to the West's tolerance to Violence. It gets more and more hardcore and acceptable as the generations pass and gets more exposed to it. It's the same case for Japan's hentai/sex culture. They are just way more advanced and ahead of us in terms of fetishism and hentai content.

I like this. Its sweet. U know i like reading hentai for the story too not just for getting off
